parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Door Hinge Failure Due to Metal Fatigue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door hinge due to metal fatigue can cause the door to separate from the frame, leading to accidents, injuries, or difficulty exiting the vehicle.
symptoms: The door sags or separates from the frame
the hinge bolts pull away from the body
the door is difficult to open or close
the door makes unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The fracture of the brake line can cause the vehicle to swerve out of control, leading to accidents and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.

The failure of the bolts holding the A/C unit compressor can cause the compressor to fall out, potentially leading to loss of power steering, which can result in loss of steering control and accidents.
symptoms: compressor falling out of the engine compartment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The locking up of the steering wheel can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
The failure of the rear axle can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially at high speeds or on slippery road surfaces.
symptoms: Rear axle shaft housing tube failure
loss of oil to the differential

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle welding can cause the rear axle to separate, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential rollovers.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience unusual noises
or uneven tire wear; the rear axle may separate
causing the vehicle to lose control or roll over.
